code.value:
from langchain_core.tools import StructuredTool

from langflow.base.agents.agent import LCToolsAgentComponent
from langflow.base.agents.events import ExceptionWithMessageError
from langflow.base.models.model_input_constants import (
    ALL_PROVIDER_FIELDS,
    MODEL_DYNAMIC_UPDATE_FIELDS,
    MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT,
    MODELS_METADATA,
)
from langflow.base.models.model_utils import get_model_name
from langflow.components.helpers import CurrentDateComponent
from langflow.components.helpers.memory import MemoryComponent
from langflow.components.langchain_utilities.tool_calling import ToolCallingAgentComponent
from langflow.custom.custom_component.component import _get_component_toolkit
from langflow.custom.utils import update_component_build_config
from langflow.field_typing import Tool
from langflow.io import BoolInput, DropdownInput, MultilineInput, Output
from langflow.logging import logger
from langflow.schema.dotdict import dotdict
from langflow.schema.message import Message


def set_advanced_true(component_input):
    component_input.advanced = True
    return component_input


class AgentComponent(ToolCallingAgentComponent):
    display_name: str = "Agent"
    description: str = "Define the agent's instructions, then enter a task to complete using tools."
    icon = "bot"
    beta = False
    name = "Agent"

    memory_inputs = [set_advanced_true(component_input) for component_input in MemoryComponent().inputs]

    inputs = [
        DropdownInput(
            name="agent_llm",
            display_name="Model Provider",
            info="The provider of the language model that the agent will use to generate responses.",
            options=[*sorted(MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.keys()), "Custom"],
            value="OpenAI",
            real_time_refresh=True,
            input_types=[],
            options_metadata=[MODELS_METADATA[key] for key in sorted(MODELS_METADATA.keys())] + [{"icon": "brain"}],
        ),
        *MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT["OpenAI"]["inputs"],
        MultilineInput(
            name="system_prompt",
            display_name="Agent Instructions",
            info="System Prompt: Initial instructions and context provided to guide the agent's behavior.",
            value="You are a helpful assistant that can use tools to answer questions and perform tasks.",
            advanced=False,
        ),
        *LCToolsAgentComponent._base_inputs,
        *memory_inputs,
        BoolInput(
            name="add_current_date_tool",
            display_name="Current Date",
            advanced=True,
            info="If true, will add a tool to the agent that returns the current date.",
            value=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [Output(name="response", display_name="Response", method="message_response")]

    async def message_response(self) -> Message:
        try:
            # Get LLM model and validate
            llm_model, display_name = self.get_llm()
            if llm_model is None:
                msg = "No language model selected. Please choose a model to proceed."
                raise ValueError(msg)
            self.model_name = get_model_name(llm_model, display_name=display_name)

            # Get memory data
            self.chat_history = await self.get_memory_data()

            # Add current date tool if enabled
            if self.add_current_date_tool:
                if not isinstance(self.tools, list):  # type: ignore[has-type]
                    self.tools = []
                current_date_tool = (await CurrentDateComponent(**self.get_base_args()).to_toolkit()).pop(0)
                if not isinstance(current_date_tool, StructuredTool):
                    msg = "CurrentDateComponent must be converted to a StructuredTool"
                    raise TypeError(msg)
                self.tools.append(current_date_tool)

            # Validate tools
            if not self.tools:
                msg = "Tools are required to run the agent. Please add at least one tool."
                raise ValueError(msg)

            # Set up and run agent
            self.set(
                llm=llm_model,
                tools=self.tools,
                chat_history=self.chat_history,
                input_value=self.input_value,
                system_prompt=self.system_prompt,
            )
            agent = self.create_agent_runnable()
            return await self.run_agent(agent)

        except (ValueError, TypeError, KeyError) as e:
            logger.error(f"{type(e).__name__}: {e!s}")
            raise
        except ExceptionWithMessageError as e:
            logger.error(f"ExceptionWithMessageError occurred: {e}")
            raise
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Unexpected error: {e!s}")
            raise

    async def get_memory_data(self):
        memory_kwargs = {
            component_input.name: getattr(self, f"{component_input.name}") for component_input in self.memory_inputs
        }
        # filter out empty values
        memory_kwargs = {k: v for k, v in memory_kwargs.items() if v}

        return await MemoryComponent(**self.get_base_args()).set(**memory_kwargs).retrieve_messages()

    def get_llm(self):
        if not isinstance(self.agent_llm, str):
            return self.agent_llm, None

        try:
            provider_info = MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.get(self.agent_llm)
            if not provider_info:
                msg = f"Invalid model provider: {self.agent_llm}"
                raise ValueError(msg)

            component_class = provider_info.get("component_class")
            display_name = component_class.display_name
            inputs = provider_info.get("inputs")
            prefix = provider_info.get("prefix", "")

            return self._build_llm_model(component_class, inputs, prefix), display_name

        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"Error building {self.agent_llm} language model: {e!s}")
            msg = f"Failed to initialize language model: {e!s}"
            raise ValueError(msg) from e

    def _build_llm_model(self, component, inputs, prefix=""):
        model_kwargs = {input_.name: getattr(self, f"{prefix}{input_.name}") for input_ in inputs}
        return component.set(**model_kwargs).build_model()

    def set_component_params(self, component):
        provider_info = MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.get(self.agent_llm)
        if provider_info:
            inputs = provider_info.get("inputs")
            prefix = provider_info.get("prefix")
            model_kwargs = {input_.name: getattr(self, f"{prefix}{input_.name}") for input_ in inputs}

            return component.set(**model_kwargs)
        return component

    def delete_fields(self, build_config: dotdict, fields: dict | list[str]) -> None:
        """Delete specified fields from build_config."""
        for field in fields:
            build_config.pop(field, None)

    def update_input_types(self, build_config: dotdict) -> dotdict:
        """Update input types for all fields in build_config."""
        for key, value in build_config.items():
            if isinstance(value, dict):
                if value.get("input_types") is None:
                    build_config[key]["input_types"] = []
            elif hasattr(value, "input_types") and value.input_types is None:
                value.input_types = []
        return build_config

    async def update_build_config(
        self, build_config: dotdict, field_value: str, field_name: str | None = None
    ) -> dotdict:
        # Iterate over all providers in the MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT
        # Existing logic for updating build_config
        if field_name in ("agent_llm",):
            build_config["agent_llm"]["value"] = field_value
            provider_info = MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.get(field_value)
            if provider_info:
                component_class = provider_info.get("component_class")
                if component_class and hasattr(component_class, "update_build_config"):
                    # Call the component class's update_build_config method
                    build_config = await update_component_build_config(
                        component_class, build_config, field_value, "model_name"
                    )

            provider_configs: dict[str, tuple[dict, list[dict]]] = {
                provider: (
                    MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT[provider]["fields"],
                    [
                        MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT[other_provider]["fields"]
                        for other_provider in MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT
                        if other_provider != provider
                    ],
                )
                for provider in MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT
            }
            if field_value in provider_configs:
                fields_to_add, fields_to_delete = provider_configs[field_value]

                # Delete fields from other providers
                for fields in fields_to_delete:
                    self.delete_fields(build_config, fields)

                # Add provider-specific fields
                if field_value == "OpenAI" and not any(field in build_config for field in fields_to_add):
                    build_config.update(fields_to_add)
                else:
                    build_config.update(fields_to_add)
                # Reset input types for agent_llm
                build_config["agent_llm"]["input_types"] = []
            elif field_value == "Custom":
                # Delete all provider fields
                self.delete_fields(build_config, ALL_PROVIDER_FIELDS)
                # Update with custom component
                custom_component = DropdownInput(
                    name="agent_llm",
                    display_name="Language Model",
                    options=[*sorted(MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.keys()), "Custom"],
                    value="Custom",
                    real_time_refresh=True,
                    input_types=["LanguageModel"],
                    options_metadata=[MODELS_METADATA[key] for key in sorted(MODELS_METADATA.keys())]
                    + [{"icon": "brain"}],
                )
                build_config.update({"agent_llm": custom_component.to_dict()})
            # Update input types for all fields
            build_config = self.update_input_types(build_config)

            # Validate required keys
            default_keys = [
                "code",
                "_type",
                "agent_llm",
                "tools",
                "input_value",
                "add_current_date_tool",
                "system_prompt",
                "agent_description",
                "max_iterations",
                "handle_parsing_errors",
                "verbose",
            ]
            missing_keys = [key for key in default_keys if key not in build_config]
            if missing_keys:
                msg = f"Missing required keys in build_config: {missing_keys}"
                raise ValueError(msg)
        if (
            isinstance(self.agent_llm, str)
            and self.agent_llm in MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT
            and field_name in MODEL_DYNAMIC_UPDATE_FIELDS
        ):
            provider_info = MODEL_PROVIDERS_DICT.get(self.agent_llm)
            if provider_info:
                component_class = provider_info.get("component_class")
                component_class = self.set_component_params(component_class)
                prefix = provider_info.get("prefix")
                if component_class and hasattr(component_class, "update_build_config"):
                    # Call each component class's update_build_config method
                    # remove the prefix from the field_name
                    if isinstance(field_name, str) and isinstance(prefix, str):
                        field_name = field_name.replace(prefix, "")
                    build_config = await update_component_build_config(
                        component_class, build_config, field_value, "model_name"
                    )
        return dotdict({k: v.to_dict() if hasattr(v, "to_dict") else v for k, v in build_config.items()})

    async def to_toolkit(self) -> list[Tool]:
        component_toolkit = _get_component_toolkit()
        tools_names = self._build_tools_names()
        agent_description = self.get_tool_description()
        # TODO: Agent Description Depreciated Feature to be removed
        description = f"{agent_description}{tools_names}"
        tools = component_toolkit(component=self).get_tools(
            tool_name=self.get_tool_name(), tool_description=description, callbacks=self.get_langchain_callbacks()
        )
        if hasattr(self, "tools_metadata"):
            tools = component_toolkit(component=self, metadata=self.tools_metadata).update_tools_metadata(tools=tools)
        return tools

code.value:
from langflow.base.data.utils import IMG_FILE_TYPES, TEXT_FILE_TYPES
from langflow.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from langflow.inputs import BoolInput
from langflow.io import (
    DropdownInput,
    FileInput,
    MessageTextInput,
    MultilineInput,
    Output,
)
from langflow.schema.message import Message
from langflow.utils.constants import (
    MESSAGE_SENDER_AI,
    MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER,
    MESSAGE_SENDER_USER,
)


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "MessagesSquare"
    name = "ChatInput"
    minimized = True

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",
            value="",
            info="Message to be passed as input.",
            input_types=[],
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="should_store_message",
            display_name="Store Messages",
            info="Store the message in the history.",
            value=True,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="sender",
            display_name="Sender Type",
            options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER],
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_USER,
            info="Type of sender.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="sender_name",
            display_name="Sender Name",
            info="Name of the sender.",
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session_id",
            display_name="Session ID",
            info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        FileInput(
            name="files",
            display_name="Files",
            file_types=TEXT_FILE_TYPES + IMG_FILE_TYPES,
            info="Files to be sent with the message.",
            advanced=True,
            is_list=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="background_color",
            display_name="Background Color",
            info="The background color of the icon.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="chat_icon",
            display_name="Icon",
            info="The icon of the message.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="text_color",
            display_name="Text Color",
            info="The text color of the name",
            advanced=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response"),
    ]

    async def message_response(self) -> Message:
        background_color = self.background_color
        text_color = self.text_color
        icon = self.chat_icon

        message = await Message.create(
            text=self.input_value,
            sender=self.sender,
            sender_name=self.sender_name,
            session_id=self.session_id,
            files=self.files,
            properties={
                "background_color": background_color,
                "text_color": text_color,
                "icon": icon,
            },
        )
        if self.session_id and isinstance(message, Message) and self.should_store_message:
            stored_message = await self.send_message(
                message,
            )
            self.message.value = stored_message
            message = stored_message

        self.status = message
        return message

from collections.abc import Generator from typing import Any from langflow.base.io.chat import ChatComponent from langflow.inputs import BoolInput from langflow.inputs.inputs import HandleInput from langflow.io import DropdownInput, MessageTextInput, Output from langflow.schema.data import Data from langflow.schema.dataframe import DataFrame from langflow.schema.message import Message from langflow.schema.properties import Source from langflow.utils.constants import ( MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER, ) class ChatOutput(ChatComponent): display_name = "Chat Output" description = "Display a chat message in the Playground." icon = "MessagesSquare" name = "ChatOutput" minimized = True inputs = [ HandleInput( name="input_value", display_name="Text", info="Message to be passed as output.", input_types=["Data", "DataFrame", "Message"], required=True, ), BoolInput( name="should_store_message", display_name="Store Messages", info="Store the message in the history.", value=True, advanced=True, ), DropdownInput( name="sender", display_name="Sender Type", options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER], value=MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, advanced=True, info="Type of sender.", ), MessageTextInput( name="sender_name", display_name="Sender Name", info="Name of the sender.", value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_AI, advanced=True, ), MessageTextInput( name="session_id", display_name="Session ID", info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.", advanced=True, ), MessageTextInput( name="data_template", display_name="Data Template", value="{text}", advanced=True, info="Template to convert Data to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Data's text key.", ), MessageTextInput( name="background_color", display_name="Background Color", info="The background color of the icon.", advanced=True, ), MessageTextInput( name="chat_icon", display_name="Icon", info="The icon of the message.", advanced=True, ), MessageTextInput( name="text_color", display_name="Text Color", info="The text color of the name", advanced=True, ), BoolInput( name="clean_data", display_name="Basic Clean Data", value=True, info="Whether to clean the data", advanced=True, ), ] outputs = [ Output( display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response", ), ] def _build_source(self, id_: str | None, display_name: str | None, source: str | None) -> Source: source_dict = {} if id_: source_dict["id"] = id_ if display_name: source_dict["display_name"] = display_name if source: # Handle case where source is a ChatOpenAI object if hasattr(source, "model_name"): source_dict["source"] = source.model_name elif hasattr(source, "model"): source_dict["source"] = str(source.model) else: source_dict["source"] = str(source) return Source(**source_dict) async def message_response(self) -> Message: # First convert the input to string if needed text = self.convert_to_string() # Get source properties source, icon, display_name, source_id = self.get_properties_from_source_component() background_color = self.background_color text_color = self.text_color if self.chat_icon: icon = self.chat_icon # Create or use existing Message object if isinstance(self.input_value, Message): message = self.input_value # Update message properties message.text = text else: message = Message(text=text) # Set message properties message.sender = self.sender message.sender_name = self.sender_name message.session_id = self.session_id message.flow_id = self.graph.flow_id if hasattr(self, "graph") else None message.properties.source = self._build_source(source_id, display_name, source) message.properties.icon = icon message.properties.background_color = background_color message.properties.text_color = text_color # Store message if needed if self.session_id and self.should_store_message: stored_message = await self.send_message(message) self.message.value = stored_message message = stored_message self.status = message return message def _validate_input(self) -> None: """Validate the input data and raise ValueError if invalid.""" if self.input_value is None: msg = "Input data cannot be None" raise ValueError(msg) if isinstance(self.input_value, list) and not all( isinstance(item, Message | Data | DataFrame | str) for item in self.input_value ): invalid_types = [ type(item).__name__ for item in self.input_value if not isinstance(item, Message | Data | DataFrame | str) ] msg = f"Expected Data or DataFrame or Message or str, got {invalid_types}" raise TypeError(msg) if not isinstance( self.input_value, Message | Data | DataFrame | str | list | Generator | type(None), ): type_name = type(self.input_value).__name__ msg = f"Expected Data or DataFrame or Message or str, Generator or None, got {type_name}" raise TypeError(msg) def _safe_convert(self, data: Any) -> str: """Safely convert input data to string.""" try: if isinstance(data, str): return data if isinstance(data, Message): return data.get_text() if isinstance(data, Data): if data.get_text() is None: msg = "Empty Data object" raise ValueError(msg) return data.get_text() if isinstance(data, DataFrame): if self.clean_data: # Remove empty rows data = data.dropna(how="all") # Remove empty lines in each cell data = data.replace(r"^\s*$", "", regex=True) # Replace multiple newlines with a single newline data = data.replace(r"\n+", "\n", regex=True) return ( data.replace(r"\|", r"\\|", regex=True) .applymap(lambda x: (str(x).replace("\n", "
") if isinstance(x, str) else x)) .to_markdown(index=False) ) return str(data) except (ValueError, TypeError, AttributeError) as e: msg = f"Error converting data: {e!s}" raise ValueError(msg) from e def convert_to_string(self) -> str | Generator[Any, None, None]: """Convert input data to string with proper error handling.""" self._validate_input() if isinstance(self.input_value, list): return "\n".join([self._safe_convert(item) for item in self.input_value]) if isinstance(self.input_value, Generator): return self.input_value return self._safe_convert(self.input_value)

from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import (
    HandleInput,
    DataInput,
    StrInput,
    MessageInput,
    MessageTextInput,
    MultilineInput,
    SecretStrInput,
    IntInput,
    FloatInput,
    BoolInput,
    DictInput,
    DropdownInput,
    FileInput,
    Output
)
from langflow.schema.message import Message


class ModalComponent(Component):
    display_name = ""
    description = "Langflow"
    icon = "modal"
    name = "ModalComponent"

    #  PropsEvents  Slots
    inputs = [
        # Props 
        BoolInput(
            name="visible",
            display_name=" (v-model)",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="default-visible",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="width",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="top",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="mask",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="title",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="title-align",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            options=["start", "center"],
            value="center",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="align-center",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="unmount-on-close",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="mask-closable",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="hide-cancel",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="simple",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="(props: any) => {  return props.notice;}",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="closable",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="ok-text",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="cancel-text",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="ok-loading",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="ok-button-props",
            display_name="",
            info="Props",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="cancel-button-props",
            display_name="",
            info="Props",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="footer",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="render-to-body",
            display_name="body",
            info=" `body` ",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="popup-container",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="body",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="mask-style",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="modal-class",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="modal-style",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="on-before-ok",
            display_name="",
            info=" ok  false  done ",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="on-before-cancel",
            display_name="",
            info=" cancel  false ",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="esc-to-close",
            display_name="ESC ",
            info=" ESC ",
            value=True,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="draggable",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="fullscreen",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="mask-animation-name",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="modal-animation-name",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="body-class",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="body-style",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=None,
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="hide-title",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value=False,
            tool_mode=True
        ),

        # Event
        StrInput(
            name="ok",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="cancel",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="open",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="close",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="before-open",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="before-close",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),

        # 
        MultilineInput(
            name="title_slot",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            tool_mode=True
        ),
        MultilineInput(
            name="footer_slot",
            display_name="",
            info="",
            tool_mode=True
        )
    ]

    # 
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Message:
        # Props
        visible_prop = f'''v-model:visible="{self.visible}"''' if self.visible else ''
        default_visible_prop = f'''default-visible="{self['default-visible']}"''' if self['default-visible'] else ''
        width_prop = f'''width="{self.width}"''' if self.width else ''
        top_prop = f'''top="{self.top}"''' if self.top else ''
        mask_prop = f'''mask="{self.mask}"''' if self.mask else ''
        title_prop = f'''title="{self.title}"''' if self.title else ''
        title_align_prop = f'''title-align="{self['title-align']}"''' if self['title-align'] else ''
        align_center_prop = f'''align-center="{self['align-center']}"''' if self['align-center'] else ''
        unmount_on_close_prop = f'''unmount-on-close="{self['unmount-on-close']}"''' if self['unmount-on-close'] else ''
        mask_closable_prop = f'''mask-closable="{self['mask-closable']}"''' if self['mask-closable'] else ''
        hide_cancel_prop = f'''hide-cancel="{self['hide-cancel']}"''' if self['hide-cancel'] else ''
        simple_prop = f'''simple="{self.simple}"''' if self.simple else ''
        closable_prop = f'''closable="{self.closable}"''' if self.closable else ''
        ok_text_prop = f'''ok-text="{self['ok-text']}"''' if self['ok-text'] else ''
        cancel_text_prop = f'''cancel-text="{self['cancel-text']}"''' if self['cancel-text'] else ''
        ok_loading_prop = f'''ok-loading="{self['ok-loading']}"''' if self['ok-loading'] else ''
        ok_button_props_prop = f'''ok-button-props="{self['ok-button-props']}"''' if self['ok-button-props'] else ''
        cancel_button_props_prop = f'''cancel-button-props="{self['cancel-button-props']}"''' if self['cancel-button-props'] else ''
        footer_prop = f'''footer="{self.footer}"''' if self.footer else ''
        render_to_body_prop = f'''render-to-body="{self['render-to-body']}"''' if self['render-to-body'] else ''
        popup_container_prop = f'''popup-container="{self['popup-container']}"''' if self['popup-container'] else ''
        mask_style_prop = f'''mask-style="{self['mask-style']}"''' if self['mask-style'] else ''
        modal_class_prop = f'''modal-class="{self['modal-class']}"''' if self['modal-class'] else ''
        modal_style_prop = f'''modal-style="{self['modal-style']}"''' if self['modal-style'] else ''
        on_before_ok_prop = f'''on-before-ok="{self['on-before-ok']}"''' if self['on-before-ok'] else ''
        on_before_cancel_prop = f'''on-before-cancel="{self['on-before-cancel']}"''' if self['on-before-cancel'] else ''
        esc_to_close_prop = f'''esc-to-close="{self['esc-to-close']}"''' if self['esc-to-close'] else ''
        draggable_prop = f'''draggable="{self.draggable}"''' if self.draggable else ''
        fullscreen_prop = f'''fullscreen="{self.fullscreen}"''' if self.fullscreen else ''
        mask_animation_name_prop = f'''mask-animation-name="{self['mask-animation-name']}"''' if self['mask-animation-name'] else ''
        modal_animation_name_prop = f'''modal-animation-name="{self['modal-animation-name']}"''' if self['modal-animation-name'] else ''
        body_class_prop = f'''body-class="{self['body-class']}"''' if self['body-class'] else ''
        body_style_prop = f'''body-style="{self['body-style']}"''' if self['body-style'] else ''
        hide_title_prop = f'''hide-title="{self['hide-title']}"''' if self['hide-title'] else ''

        # Event
        ok_event = f'''@ok="{self.ok}"''' if self.ok else ''
        cancel_event = f'''@cancel="{self.cancel}"''' if self.cancel else ''
        open_event = f'''@open="{self.open}"''' if self.open else ''
        close_event = f'''@close="{self.close}"''' if self.close else ''
        before_open_event = f'''@before-open="{self['before-open']}"''' if self['before-open'] else ''
        before_close_event = f'''@before-close="{self['before-close']}"''' if self['before-close'] else ''

        # 
        title_slot = f'''<template #title>{self.title_slot}</template>''' if self.title_slot else ''
        footer_slot = f'''<template #footer>{self.footer_slot}</template>''' if self.footer_slot else ''

        # 
        props_and_events = " ".join(filter(None, [
            visible_prop, default_visible_prop, width_prop, top_prop, mask_prop, title_prop, title_align_prop,
            align_center_prop, unmount_on_close_prop, mask_closable_prop, hide_cancel_prop, simple_prop,
            closable_prop, ok_text_prop, cancel_text_prop, ok_loading_prop, ok_button_props_prop,
            cancel_button_props_prop, footer_prop, render_to_body_prop, popup_container_prop, mask_style_prop,
            modal_class_prop, modal_style_prop, on_before_ok_prop, on_before_cancel_prop, esc_to_close_prop,
            draggable_prop, fullscreen_prop, mask_animation_name_prop, modal_animation_name_prop, body_class_prop,
            body_style_prop, hide_title_prop, ok_event, cancel_event, open_event, close_event, before_open_event,
            before_close_event
        ]))
        result = f"<a-modal {props_and_events}> {title_slot} {footer_slot} </a-modal>"

        return Message(
            text=result,
        )

from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, Output, DropdownInput
from langflow.schema import Data
from datetime import datetime


class CalendarComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Calendar Component"
    description = "A custom calendar component for Langflow."
    documentation: str = "https://docs.langflow.org/components-custom-components"
    icon = "calendar"
    name = "CalendarComponent"

    #  PropsEvents  Slots
    inputs = [
        # Props 
        MessageTextInput(
            name="model_value",
            display_name="Model Value (v-model)",
            info="The bound value of the calendar",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="default_value",
            display_name="Default Value",
            info="The default value of the calendar (uncontrolled state)",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="mode",
            display_name="Mode",
            info="The mode of the calendar, can be 'month' or 'year'",
            options=["month", "year"],
            value=""
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="default_mode",
            display_name="Default Mode",
            info="The default mode of the calendar, default is 'month'",
            options=["month", "year"],
            value="month"
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="modes",
            display_name="Display Modes",
            info="The display modes of the calendar, default is ['month', 'year']",
            value="['month', 'year']",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
        # Events 
        MessageTextInput(
            name="events",
            display_name="Events",
            info="Events for the calendar, input as a string. e.g. 'change,panel-change'",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
        # Slots 
        MessageTextInput(
            name="slots",
            display_name="Slots",
            info="Slots for the calendar, input as a string. e.g. 'header,default'",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
    ]

    # 
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        # 
        model_value = self.model_value
        default_value = self.default_value
        mode = self.mode
        default_mode = self.default_mode
        modes = self.modes
        events = self.events
        slots = self.slots

        # 
        # 
        output_data = {
            "model_value": model_value,
            "default_value": default_value,
            "mode": mode,
            "default_mode": default_mode,
            "modes": modes,
            "events": events,
            "slots": slots,
        }

        data = Data(value=output_data)
        self.status = data
        return data

from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import (
    StrInput,
    DropdownInput,
    BoolInput,
    Output
)
from langflow.schema import Data


class ButtonComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Button Component"
    description = "A custom button component for Langflow."
    documentation: str = "https://docs.langflow.org/components-custom-components"
    icon = "button"
    name = "ButtonComponent"

    #  PropsEvents  Slots
    inputs = [
        # Props 
        DropdownInput(
            name="type",
            display_name="Button Type",
            info="The type of the button, including secondary, primary, dashed, outline, text.",
            options=["secondary", "primary", "dashed", "outline", "text"],
            value="secondary"
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="shape",
            display_name="Button Shape",
            info="The shape of the button.",
            value=""
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="status",
            display_name="Button Status",
            info="The status of the button, can be normal, warning, success, danger.",
            options=["normal", "warning", "success", "danger"],
            value="normal"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="size",
            display_name="Button Size",
            info="The size of the button, can be mini, small, medium, large.",
            options=["mini", "small", "medium", "large"],
            value="medium"
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="long",
            display_name="Adaptive Width",
            info="Whether the button width adapts to the container.",
            value=False
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="loading",
            display_name="Loading State",
            info="Whether the button is in the loading state.",
            value=False
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="disabled",
            display_name="Disabled State",
            info="Whether the button is disabled.",
            value=False
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="html_type",
            display_name="HTML Type",
            info="Set the native 'type' attribute of the button, refer to HTML standard.",
            value="button"
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="autofocus",
            display_name="Autofocus",
            info="Set the native 'autofocus' attribute of the button, refer to HTML standard.",
            value=False
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="href",
            display_name="Link",
            info="Set the jump link. When this property is set, the button is rendered as an 'a' tag.",
            value=""
        ),
        # Events 
        StrInput(
            name="events",
            display_name="Events",
            info="Events for the button, input as a string. e.g. 'click'",
            value=""
        ),
        # Slots 
        StrInput(
            name="slots",
            display_name="Slots",
            info="Slots for the button, input as a string. e.g. 'icon'",
            value=""
        )
    ]

    # 
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        # 
        button_type = self.type
        shape = self.shape
        status = self.status
        size = self.size
        long = self.long
        loading = self.loading
        disabled = self.disabled
        html_type = self.html_type
        autofocus = self.autofocus
        href = self.href
        events = self.events
        slots = self.slots

        # 
        output_data = {
            "type": button_type,
            "shape": shape,
            "status": status,
            "size": size,
            "long": long,
            "loading": loading,
            "disabled": disabled,
            "html_type": html_type,
            "autofocus": autofocus,
            "href": href,
            "events": events,
            "slots": slots
        }

        data = Data(value=output_data)
        self.status = data
        return data

# from langflow.field_typing import Data
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from langflow.schema import Data


class CustomComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Custom Component"
    description = "Use as a template to create your own component."
    documentation: str = "https://docs.langflow.org/components-custom-components"
    icon = "code"
    name = "CustomComponent"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Input Value",
            info="This is a custom component Input",
            value="Hello, World!",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        data = Data(value=self.input_value)
        self.status = data
        return data

from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import (
    HandleInput,
    DataInput,
    StrInput,
    MessageInput,
    MessageTextInput,
    MultilineInput,
    SecretStrInput,
    IntInput,
    FloatInput,
    BoolInput,
    DictInput,
    DropdownInput,
    FileInput,
    Output
)
from langflow.schema.message import Message


class ButtonComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Button Component"
    description = "A custom button component for Langflow."
    icon = "button"
    name = "ButtonComponent"

    #  PropsEvents  Slots
    inputs = [
        # Props 
        DropdownInput(
            name="type",
            display_name="Button Type",
            info="The type of the button, including secondary, primary, dashed, outline, text.",
            options=["secondary", "primary", "dashed", "outline", "text"],
            value="secondary"
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="status",
            display_name="Button Status",
            info="The status of the button, can be normal, warning, success, danger.",
            options=["normal", "warning", "success", "danger"],
            value="normal"
        ),
        #  size 
        DropdownInput(
            name="size",
            display_name="Button Size",
            info="The size of the button, can be mini, small, medium, large.",
            options=["mini", "small", "medium", "large"],
            value="medium"
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="long",
            display_name="Adaptive Width",
            info="Whether the button width adapts to the container.",
            value=False
        ),

        ## Event
        StrInput(
            name="open",
            display_name="Open event",
            info="Events for the button, input as a string. e.g. 'open'",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="close",
            display_name="Close events",
            info="Events for the button, input as a string. e.g. 'close'",
            value=""
        ),

        ## 
        MultilineInput(
            name="children",
            display_name="Children ",
            info="",
        ),
    ]

    # 
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Message:
        # Props
        type_prop = f'''type="{self.type}"''' if self.type else ''
        status_prop = f'''status="{self.status}"''' if self.status else ''
        size_prop = f'''size="{self.size}"''' if self.size else ''

        # Event
        open_event = f'''@open="{self.open}"''' if self.open else ''
        close_event = f'''@close="{self.close}"''' if self.close else ''

        # 
        children = self.children if self.children else ''

        # 
        props_and_events = " ".join(filter(None, [type_prop, status_prop, size_prop, open_event, close_event]))
        result = f"<a-button {props_and_events}> {children} </a-button>"

        return Message(
            text=result,
        )

from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import (
    HandleInput,
    DataInput,
    StrInput,
    MessageInput,
    MessageTextInput,
    MultilineInput,
    SecretStrInput,
    IntInput,
    FloatInput,
    BoolInput,
    DictInput,
    DropdownInput,

from langflow.schema.message import Message


class ArcoModalComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Modal Component"
    description = "A custom modal component for Langflow."
    icon = "modal"
    name = "ModalComponent"

    #  PropsEvents  Slots
    inputs = [
        # Props 
        BoolInput(
            name="visible",
            display_name="Visible (v-model)",
            info="Whether the dialog is visible.",
            value=False
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="default-visible",
            display_name="Default Visible",
            info="Whether the dialog is visible by default (in uncontrolled state).",
            value=False
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="width",
            display_name="Width",
            info="The width of the dialog. If not set, the width value in the style will be used.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="top",
            display_name="Top",
            info="The distance from the top of the dialog. It does not take effect when center display is enabled.",
            value=None
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="mask",
            display_name="Mask",
            info="Whether to display the mask layer.",
            value=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="title",
            display_name="Title",
            info="The title of the dialog.",
            value=None
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="title-align",
            display_name="Title Align",
            info="The horizontal alignment direction of the title.",
            options=["start", "center"],
            value="center"
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="align-center",
            display_name="Align Center",
            info="Whether the dialog is displayed in the center.",
            value=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="unmount-on-close",
            display_name="Unmount on Close",
            info="Whether to unmount the node when closing.",
            value=False
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="mask-closable",
            display_name="Mask Closable",
            info="Whether the dialog can be closed by clicking on the mask layer.",
            value=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="hide-cancel",
            display_name="Hide Cancel",
            info="Whether to hide the cancel button.",
            value=False
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="simple",
            display_name="Simple",
            info="Whether to enable the simple mode.",
            value="(props: any) => {  return props.notice;}"
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="closable",
            display_name="Closable",
            info="Whether to display the close button.",
            value=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="ok-text",
            display_name="OK Text",
            info="The content of the confirm button.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="cancel-text",
            display_name="Cancel Text",
            info="The content of the cancel button.",
            value=None
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="ok-loading",
            display_name="OK Loading",
            info="Whether the confirm button is in the loading state.",
            value=False
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="ok-button-props",
            display_name="OK Button Props",
            info="The Props of the confirm button.",
            value=None
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="cancel-button-props",
            display_name="Cancel Button Props",
            info="The Props of the cancel button.",
            value=None
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="footer",
            display_name="Footer",
            info="Whether to display the footer part.",
            value=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="render-to-body",
            display_name="Render to Body",
            info="Whether the dialog is mounted under the 'body' element.",
            value=True
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="popup-container",
            display_name="Popup Container",
            info="The mounting container of the pop - up box.",
            value="body"
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="mask-style",
            display_name="Mask Style",
            info="The style of the mask layer.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="modal-class",
            display_name="Modal Class",
            info="The class name of the dialog.",
            value=None
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="modal-style",
            display_name="Modal Style",
            info="The style of the dialog.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="on-before-ok",
            display_name="On Before OK",
            info="The callback function before the 'ok' event is triggered. If it returns false, subsequent events will not be triggered, and 'done' can also be used for asynchronous closing.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="on-before-cancel",
            display_name="On Before Cancel",
            info="The callback function before the 'cancel' event is triggered. If it returns false, subsequent events will not be triggered.",
            value=None
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="esc-to-close",
            display_name="ESC to Close",
            info="Whether to support closing the dialog with the ESC key.",
            value=True
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="draggable",
            display_name="Draggable",
            info="Whether to support dragging.",
            value=False
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="fullscreen",
            display_name="Fullscreen",
            info="Whether to enable full - screen mode.",
            value=False
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="mask-animation-name",
            display_name="Mask Animation Name",
            info="The animation name of the mask layer.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="modal-animation-name",
            display_name="Modal Animation Name",
            info="The animation name of the dialog.",
            value=None
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="body-class",
            display_name="Body Class",
            info="The class name of the dialog content part.",
            value=None
        ),
        DictInput(
            name="body-style",
            display_name="Body Style",
            info="The style of the dialog content part.",
            value=None
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="hide-title",
            display_name="Hide Title",
            info="Whether to hide the title.",
            value=False
        ),

        # Event
        StrInput(
            name="ok",
            display_name="OK Event",
            info="Triggered when the confirm button is clicked.",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="cancel",
            display_name="Cancel Event",
            info="Triggered when the cancel or close button is clicked.",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="open",
            display_name="Open Event",
            info="Triggered after the dialog is opened (after the animation ends).",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="close",
            display_name="Close Event",
            info="Triggered after the dialog is closed (after the animation ends).",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="before-open",
            display_name="Before Open Event",
            info="Triggered before the dialog is opened.",
            value=""
        ),
        StrInput(
            name="before-close",
            display_name="Before Close Event",
            info="Triggered before the dialog is closed.",
            value=""
        ),

        # 
        MultilineInput(
            name="title_slot",
            display_name="Title Slot",
            info="The content for the title slot."
        ),
        MultilineInput(
            name="footer_slot",
            display_name="Footer Slot",
            info="The content for the footer slot."
        )
    ]

    # 
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Message:
        # Props
        visible_prop = f'''v-model:visible="{self.visible}"''' if self.visible is not None else ''
        default_visible_prop = f'''default-visible="{self['default-visible']}"''' if self['default-visible'] is not None else ''
        width_prop = f'''width="{self.width}"''' if self.width else ''
        top_prop = f'''top="{self.top}"''' if self.top else ''
        mask_prop = f'''mask="{self.mask}"''' if self.mask is not None else ''
        title_prop = f'''title="{self.title}"''' if self.title else ''
        title_align_prop = f'''title-align="{self['title-align']}"''' if self['title-align'] else ''
        align_center_prop = f'''align-center="{self['align-center']}"''' if self['align-center'] is not None else ''
        unmount_on_close_prop = f'''unmount-on-close="{self['unmount-on-close']}"''' if self['unmount-on-close'] is not None else ''
        mask_closable_prop = f'''mask-closable="{self['mask-closable']}"''' if self['mask-closable'] is not None else ''
        hide_cancel_prop = f'''hide-cancel="{self['hide-cancel']}"''' if self['hide-cancel'] is not None else ''
        simple_prop = f'''simple="{self.simple}"''' if self.simple else ''
        closable_prop = f'''closable="{self.closable}"''' if self.closable is not None else ''
        ok_text_prop = f'''ok-text="{self['ok-text']}"''' if self['ok-text'] else ''
        cancel_text_prop = f'''cancel-text="{self['cancel-text']}"''' if self['cancel-text'] else ''
        ok_loading_prop = f'''ok-loading="{self['ok-loading']}"''' if self['ok-loading'] is not None else ''
        ok_button_props_prop = f'''ok-button-props="{self['ok-button-props']}"''' if self['ok-button-props'] else ''
        cancel_button_props_prop = f'''cancel-button-props="{self['cancel-button-props']}"''' if self['cancel-button-props'] else ''
        footer_prop = f'''footer="{self.footer}"''' if self.footer is not None else ''
        render_to_body_prop = f'''render-to-body="{self['render-to-body']}"''' if self['render-to-body'] is not None else ''
        popup_container_prop = f'''popup-container="{self['popup-container']}"''' if self['popup-container'] else ''
        mask_style_prop = f'''mask-style="{self['mask-style']}"''' if self['mask-style'] else ''
        modal_class_prop = f'''modal-class="{self['modal-class']}"''' if self['modal-class'] else ''
        modal_style_prop = f'''modal-style="{self['modal-style']}"''' if self['modal-style'] else ''
        on_before_ok_prop = f'''on-before-ok="{self['on-before-ok']}"''' if self['on-before-ok'] else ''
        on_before_cancel_prop = f'''on-before-cancel="{self['on-before-cancel']}"''' if self['on-before-cancel'] else ''
        esc_to_close_prop = f'''esc-to-close="{self['esc-to-close']}"''' if self['esc-to-close'] is not None else ''
        draggable_prop = f'''draggable="{self.draggable}"''' if self.draggable is not None else ''
        fullscreen_prop = f'''fullscreen="{self.fullscreen}"''' if self.fullscreen is not None else ''
        mask_animation_name_prop = f'''mask-animation-name="{self['mask-animation-name']}"''' if self['mask-animation-name'] else ''
        modal_animation_name_prop = f'''modal-animation-name="{self['modal-animation-name']}"''' if self['modal-animation-name'] else ''
        body_class_prop = f'''body-class="{self['body-class']}"''' if self['body-class'] else ''
        body_style_prop = f'''body-style="{self['body-style']}"''' if self['body-style'] else ''
        hide_title_prop = f'''hide-title="{self['hide-title']}"''' if self['hide-title'] is not None else ''

        # Event
        ok_event = f'''@ok="{self.ok}"''' if self.ok else ''
        cancel_event = f'''@cancel="{self.cancel}"''' if self.cancel else ''
        open_event = f'''@open="{self.open}"''' if self.open else ''
        close_event = f'''@close="{self.close}"''' if self.close else ''
        before_open_event = f'''@before-open="{self['before-open']}"''' if self['before-open'] else ''
        before_close_event = f'''@before-close="{self['before-close']}"''' if self['before-close'] else ''

        # 
        title_slot = f'''<template #title>{self.title_slot}</template>''' if self.title_slot else ''
        footer_slot = f'''<template #footer>{self.footer_slot}</template>''' if self.footer_slot else ''

        # 
        props_and_events = " ".join(filter(None, [
            visible_prop, default_visible_prop, width_prop, top_prop, mask_prop, title_prop, title_align_prop,
            align_center_prop, unmount_on_close_prop, mask_closable_prop, hide_cancel_prop, simple_prop,
            closable_prop, ok_text_prop, cancel_text_prop, ok_loading_prop, ok_button_props_prop,
            cancel_button_props_prop, footer_prop, render_to_body_prop, popup_container_prop, mask_style_prop,
            modal_class_prop, modal_style_prop, on_before_ok_prop, on_before_cancel_prop, esc_to_close_prop,
            draggable_prop, fullscreen_prop, mask_animation_name_prop, modal_animation_name_prop, body_class_prop,
            body_style_prop, hide_title_prop, ok_event, cancel_event, open_event, close_event, before_open_event,
            before_close_event
        ]))
        result = f"<a-modal {props_and_events}> {title_slot} {footer_slot} </a-modal>"

        return Message(
            text=result,
        )
code.name: code

default-visible.name: default-visible
default-visible.info: Whether the dialog is visible by default (in uncontrolled state).

esc-to-close.name: esc-to-close
esc-to-close.info: Whether to support closing the dialog with the ESC key.

footer.name: footer
footer.info: Whether to display the footer part.

footer_slot.name: footer_slot
footer_slot.info: The content for the footer slot.

fullscreen.name: fullscreen
fullscreen.info: Whether to enable full - screen mode.

hide-cancel.name: hide-cancel
hide-cancel.info: Whether to hide the cancel button.

mask.name: mask
mask.info: Whether to display the mask layer.

mask-animation-name.name: mask-animation-name
mask-animation-name.info: The animation name of the mask layer.

mask-closable.name: mask-closable
mask-closable.info: Whether the dialog can be closed by clicking on the mask layer.

mask-style.name: mask-style
mask-style.info: The style of the mask layer.

modal-animation-name.name: modal-animation-name
modal-animation-name.info: The animation name of the dialog.

modal-class.name: modal-class
modal-class.info: The class name of the dialog.

ok.name: ok
ok.info: Triggered when the confirm button is clicked.

ok-button-props.name: ok-button-props
ok-button-props.info: The Props of the confirm button.

ok-loading.name: ok-loading
ok-loading.info: Whether the confirm button is in the loading state.

ok-text.name: ok-text
ok-text.info: The content of the confirm button.

on-before-cancel.name: on-before-cancel
on-before-cancel.info: The callback function before the 'cancel' event is triggered. If it returns false, subsequent events will not be triggered.

on-before-ok.name: on-before-ok
on-before-ok.info: The callback function before the 'ok' event is triggered. If it returns false, subsequent events will not be triggered, and 'done' can also be used for asynchronous closing.

open.name: open
open.info: Triggered after the dialog is opened (after the animation ends).

popup-container.name: popup-container
popup-container.info: The mounting container of the pop - up box.

render-to-body.name: render-to-body
render-to-body.info: Whether the dialog is mounted under the 'body' element.

simple.name: simple
simple.info: Whether to enable the simple mode.

title-align.name: title-align
title-align.info: The horizontal alignment direction of the title.

title_slot.name: title_slot
title_slot.info: The content for the title slot.

top.name: top
top.info: The distance from the top of the dialog. It does not take effect when center display is enabled.

unmount-on-close.name: unmount-on-close
unmount-on-close.info: Whether to unmount the node when closing.

width.name: width
width.info: The width of the dialog. If not set, the width value in the style will be used.

node.description: A custom modal component for Langflow.

name: Arco-Agent
description: A simple but powerful starter agent.
